title: Brighton v West Ham: Premier League – live
summary: Brighton faces West Ham at the Amex, aiming to improve their league position. Daniel Harris will provide live updates on the match. A win could help Brighton continue their ascent up the table.

title: Abu Dhabi Grand Prix: F1 title decider – live
summary: Lando Norris, Max Verstappen, and Oscar Piastri are set to compete for the championship at Yas Marina Circuit. Niall McVeigh will provide live updates on the event. The showdown promises to be an exciting battle for the title.

title: Leicester City 0-3 Manchester City, Tottenham 2-1 Aston Villa, and more: WSL clockwatch – live
summary: Manchester City achieved their ninth win in ten Women's Super League matches. Meanwhile, Tottenham managed a late victory against Aston Villa, who played with ten players. The matches highlight the competitive nature of the league this season.

title: Why are we not better people?
summary: A popular series invites readers to respond to each other's questions, covering a wide range of topics from light-hearted inquiries to deep scientific and philosophical discussions. This collaborative platform encourages community engagement and knowledge sharing. It continues to be a valuable source of insight and entertainment.

title: How Australia became the testing ground for a social media ban for young people
summary: A groundbreaking piece of legislation in South Australia has rapidly progressed from an initial policy concept to approval by federal parliament in just a few days. This pioneering law will come into effect on December 10. Its swift approval marks a significant achievement in legislative development.
